response.original_title: Spike & Mike's Festival of Animation: Volume 2
response.overview: A compilation of 18 innovative animated films, including Academy Award winners "Creature comforts" and "Manipulation."  Contents: Jean Jean and the evil cat (2:00) License to kill (2:45) La pista (2:00) Adam (4:00) Negative man (2:30) Singing ding a lings (4:00) The log (2:45) Next door (2:15) Creature comforts at home (4:40) Street sweeper (4:15) Visions from the Amazon (2:50) Amore Baciami (3:00) Grasshoppers (8:30) Manipulation (6:20) Panspermia (1:30) Big fat world of science (4:39) Dinko's day (1:47) Creature comforts (5:00)
response.tagline: If it doesn't say Spike & Mike - Tell'em to take a hike!
response.title: Spike & Mike's Festival of Animation: Volume 2
